To Too Harsh Discipline.--Oh, how God is dishonored in a family where there is no true understanding 
                                                                           280
as to what constitutes family discipline, and children are confused as to what is discipline and government. It is true that too harsh discipline, too much criticism, unrequired laws and regulations, lead to disrespect of authority and to the disregarding finally of those regulations that Christ would have fulfilled.
